text: Huỳnh Thị Thanh Thủy (born 1 July 2002) is a Vietnamese model and beauty queen who was crowned Miss International 2024 pageant. She was previously crowned Miss Vietnam 2022. == Early life == Huỳnh Thị Thanh Thủy was born in Da Nang. In the Da Nang Excellent Student Selection Examination for the 2019–2020 school year, she won second prize in the Vietnamese Literature contest. She is currently studying English Language at the University of Foreign Language Studies, a member of the University of Da Nang system. At the same time, she also studying at University of Greenwich. == Pageant career == === Miss Vietnam 2022 === On December 23, 2022, Thanh Thủy represented Da Nang at Miss Vietnam 2022 pageant and competing against 58 other contestants at the Phu Tho Indoor Stadium in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, where she won the national title and was succeeded by Đỗ Thị Hà. === Miss International 2024 === On November 12, 2024, Thanh Thủy represented Vietnam at the Miss International 2024 and competing against 71 other contestants at the Tokyo Dome City Hall in Tokyo, Japan. At the end of the event, Thanh Thủy was crowned by outgoing Andrea Rubio of Venezuela. She became the first Vietnamese woman to win Miss International crown. == References == Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Beauty pageant winners Category:Vietnamese people
title: Huỳnh Thị Thanh Thủy
